user.title: Virtual Step-Dimmer
user.description: Select the switch and sensor entities to use for the virtual step-dimmer.

brightness.title: Configure Brightness Steps
brightness.description: Enter a comma-separated list of power sensor values (in watts) that correspond to each brightness step. For example: 10, 25, 50, 100

advanced.title: Advanced Options
advanced.description: Fine-tune the timing for your specific hardware. In most cases, the defaults are fine.

error.invalid_brightness_steps: Invalid input. Please provide a comma-separated list of positive numbers (e.g., 10, 25, 50).
